author: Simon Difford
description: Maple syrup works well with whiskey but not so well with blanco tequila. It works better with reposado tequila, but best with a√±ejo tequila. It seems a syrup that oozes out of wood likes wood! Experimentation also proved that a mix of lemon and lime is better than lime on its own in this Margarita.
name: Maple Margarita
recipeIngredient: 2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
